description: What could be better than a Pecan Pie Shake for Thanksgiving? This shake is best when served with whipped cream and a sprinkle of nutmeg. It's best to make this well in advance so the flavors can blend together. If you want, you can also add some cinnamon or ground ginger to taste.
name: Pecan Pie Shake

recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, combine vanilla ice cream, milk, bourbon, and chopped pecan pie.
recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine vanilla ice cream, milk, bourbon, and chopped pecan pie.

recipeInstructions.name: Blend until desired consistency. (Add more ice cream if the mixture is too thin, and more milk if it’s too thick.)
recipeInstructions.text: Blend until desired consistency. (Add more ice cream if the mixture is too thin, and more milk if it’s too thick.)

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into glass and garnish with crumbled pecan pie.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into glass and garnish with crumbled pecan pie.
